title: Schutz - Geistliche Chormusik - Ehmann (1970)
description:
- Composer: Heinrich SchÃ¼tz (1585-1672, German, early baroque)

- Work: Geistliche Chormusik 1648 (selection of sacred choral music composed in 1648)

- Played by: WestfÃ¤lische Kantorei & Wilhelm Ehmann

- Record label and date: Cantate, 1970

- My comment: Stunning choral works, with all the purity proper to early baroque, and yet complexity with masterful counterpoint. This version is not well-know, but is IMO the best one, with great balance between voices and orchestra, played with sobriety while remaining a colourful radiant music.

Welcome to Caudheur's Classical Catalog (CCC)!


I have a pretty decent collection of classical music, encoded in lossless format (FLAC).

I will start to upload as much as I can, because I believe great works of art should be shared for all mankind  :)
